pkgmetadata.longdescription: Antares Visualizations // Visualize results generated by Antares, a powerful software developed by RTE to simulate and study electric power systems (more information about Antares here: https://antares.rte-france.com). This package provides functions that create interactive charts to help Antares users visually explore the results of their simulations. You can see the results of several ANTARES studies here : http://bpnumerique.rte-france.com/.
